mapper.update: update ujcms_user_ext set birthday_ = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, location_ = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bio_ = #{bio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_ = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, history_password_ = #{historyPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_date_ = #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_ip_ = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_count_ = #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, error_date_ = #{errorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, error_count_ = #{errorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
